alert.note: Alert for North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 12:17PM PST until December 05 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southeast Siskiyou County, including the community of Tennant. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See http://quickmap.dot.ca.go for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County
